New Records: LeBron James and Bronny James made NBA history by becoming the first father-son duo to play together in any NBA game
Key Match Events: LeBron James and Bronny James played together for around four minutes in the second quarter of the game
LeBron James set a screen for Bronny James to take a 3-point shot
Pre-Game Insights: LeBron James expressed excitement about the opportunity to play with his son, saying it would be 'amazing' and 'pure joy'
LeBron James stated that his goal was to play with his son, either in the same uniform or in a matchup against him
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James described the experience as 'definitely a moment that I will never forget'
LeBron James said it was 'pretty cool for the both of us, and especially for our family'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bronny James turned 20 years old on the day of the game
The Lakers narrowly lost to the Suns, 114-118
Others: LeBron James and Bronny James will continue to play together throughout the season
The father-son duo's appearance on the court together was not 'gimmicky', but rather occurred naturally in the flow of the game
